name: Twine - variables and conditional logic
description:
This is a Twine file that you can download -- it pretty much has all of the code we've talked about so far -- how to prompt for players' names, how to assign unique images and colors to the backgrounds of passages based on how they are tagged, how to create variables, and how to move to a new passage only when a variables reaches a certain value.

Feel free to play it and look through it- copy/paste anything you need and we can talk about it anytime.
